author: perezhilton
title: See A Pic Of The Envelope Warren Beatty & Faye Dunaway Got At The 2017 Oscars — How Did No One Notice This Mistake?! | PerezHilton.com
text:
Oh Oscars !
What a mess up!
While you might've thought the La La Land / Moonlight Best Picture goof was a simple mistake, it was seriously careless.
Check out the pic (above) of the envelope that says Best Actress in a Leading Role in lots of gold!
Sure, the name inside might've thrown Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway , but the freakin' envelope said the category!
SOMEONE should've noticed that! Perhaps even the person who handed them the envelope??
[ Image via ABC . ]
Tags: academy awards , academy awards 2017 , oscars , oscars 2017
